thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Paris Porte de Versailles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Issy-les-Moulineaux, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very pleasant hotel and staff
thread.title_full: Very pleasant hotel and staff - Review of BEST WESTERN Paris Porte de Versailles, Issy-les-Moulineaux, France - TripAdvisor

author: user1001130
title: Very pleasant hotel and staff
text: I booked this hotel for a short stay to attend an event in Paris. The location is good and very close to the metro, which was perfect for us. The room we stayed in was very clean and comfortable. Breakfast was lovely. The pastries in particular were very tasty. Overall, we found the hotel great value and had a lovely stay. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly. They helped to make the stay very pleasant and nothing was too much trouble for them. I would definitely stay here again.
